Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The Holy Roman Empire controls a considerable amount of power through most of Europe. There are certain actions that the church has enough influence to enforce and are, effectively, treated as laws."

([ "description":"Apostasy as defined by the Holy Roman Catholic Church is the practice in which a person or persons abandon or renounces the religious beliefs, scripture, and practices set forth by our Heavenly Father and the His Holiness the Pope.", "value":10 ])
([ "description":"Blasphemy is the act or offense of speaking sacrilegiously about or against God or sacred things.", "value":4 ])

Core:Property.property: crimes:desecration of catholic cathedrals or chapels

Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: ([ "description":"Defacing, damaging, polluting, or otherwise physically mistreating in a way that the defendant knows will outrage the sensibilities of persons likely to observe or discover the defendant's action.", "value":6 ])

([ "description":"Heresy is a gross and dangerous error, voluntarily held and factiously maintained by some person or persons within the visible Church, in opposition to the chief or substantial truth or truths grounded upon and drawn from the Holy Scripture by necessary consequence.", "value":10 ])
([ "description":"Paganism is defined as any non-Christian religion. The church does not recognize any religion other than Catholicism as legal.", "value":7 ])
